articles.author: Zia Weise
articles.title: Brussels vows ‘firm’ response to potential Trump tariffs as EU braces for trade war - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: European Commission says the bloc “regrets” new U.S. tariffs on Mexico, Canada and China.
articles.content: Its important that we dont divide the world with numerous tariff barriers, Scholz said on Sunday after meeting with British Prime Minister Keir Starmer in the U.K. The EU is "a strong economic area a… [+1480 chars]
